Title: Prohibits requiring parents or caretakers to earn a minimum wage or work a minimum number of hours to be eligible for child care assistance
Summary: Prohibits requiring parents or caretakers to earn a minimum wage to be eligible for child care assistance.
LawCode: Amd ยง410-w, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to prohibiting requiring parents or caretakers to earn a minimum wage to be eligible for child care assistance
